ranks.name: ACROBATICS
ranks.description:
While flying, you get the following benefits:
  • You make all Agility checks and saves with +1 Accuracy.
  • Any time an attack misses you, you may fly up to 2 spaces in any direction as a reaction.

synergies.detail: Make all Agility checks and saves with +1 Accuracy.

actions.name: Acrobatics
actions.trigger: Any time an attack misses you.
actions.detail: You may fly up to 2 spaces in any direction.

ranks.name: AFTERBURNERS
ranks.description: When you Boost while flying, you may move an additional 2d3 spaces, but take Heat equal to half that amount.

synergies.detail: When you Boost while flying, you may move an additional 2d3 spaces, but take Heat equal to half that amount.

ranks.name: SUPERSONIC
ranks.description: Whenever you Boost while flying, you ignore engagement and reactions and may reroll Afterburners dice, picking either result.

name: DUELIST MK. II
terse: A New Duelist From A New Era

ranks.name: PARTISAN
ranks.description: Gain +1 Accuracy when using Main Melee weapons to attack targets within half of your Threat.

synergies.detail: Gain +1 Accuracy when using Main Melee weapons to attack targets within half of your Threat.

ranks.name: BLADEMASTER
ranks.description:
1/turn, when you hit with a Main Melee weapon, you gain 1 Blademaster Die – a d6 – up to a maximum of 3 Blademaster Die. They last until expended or the current scene ends. You can expend Blademaster Dice 1-for-1 for the following:
  • Parry: As a reaction when you’re hit by a melee attack, you gain Resistance to all damage, heat, and Burn dealt by the attack and deal 1d3+3 damage of that attack’s type to the attacker.
  • Deflect: As a reaction when you’re hit by a ranged attack, you may roll any number of Blademaster Dice, expending them: if you roll a 4+ on any of these dice, you gain Resistance to all damage, heat, and Burn dealt by the attack and deal 1d3+3 damage of that attack’s type to the attacker.
  • Feint: Disengage as a free action.
  • Trip: As a quick action, choose an adjacent character: they must pass an Agility save at +1 Difficulty or fall Prone. Whatever the result, you may freely pass through their space until the end of your current turn, although you can’t end your turn in their space.

synergies.detail: 1/turn, when you hit with a Main Melee weapon, gain 1 Blademaster Die.

ranks.name: UNSTOPPABLE
ranks.description:
Gain the following additional options for Blademaster:
  • Finesse: 1/round, when you hit with a melee attack on your turn, you may spend a Blademaster Die to immediately Grapple or Ram your target after resolving the attack.
  • Riposte: Whenever you’re missed by a melee attack, you may spend a Blademaster Die to make a single attack against them using a Main Melee weapon.

name: HACKER MK. II
description: ALL YOUR BASE ARE BELONG TO US

ranks.name: SNOW_CRASH
ranks.description: When you hit with a tech attack that consumes Lock On, you may choose to have the target either take an additional 2 Heat or be pushed 3 spaces in a direction of your choice.

synergies.detail: When you hit with a tech attack that consumes Lock On, your target must choose to either take 2 Heat or be pushed 3 spaces in a direction of your choice.

ranks.name: SAFE_CRACKER
ranks.description: Gain the following options for Invade:

actions.name: Jam Cockpit
actions.detail: The target can only draw line of sight to spaces within Range 3 and characters cannot Mount or Dismount your target until the cockpit is fixed with a successful Engineering check as a full action.

actions.name: Disable Life Support
actions.detail: Your target receives +1 Difficulty on all saves and checks until the life-support system is rebooted with a successful Systems check as a quick action.

actions.name: Hack./Slash
actions.detail: Your target cannot benefit from or take Quick or Full Tech actions until the mech is either Shut Down or its core computer is rebooted with a successful Systems save as a quick action.

ranks.name: LAST ARGUMENT OF KINGS
ranks.description: Gain the Last Argument of Kings Quick Tech Option

actions.name: Last Argument of Kings
actions.detail: After hitting with a tech attack, you may activate this system, causing the target to take an extra 2 Heat and take AP Energy damage equal to their current Heat. If this action causes the target to overheat, it resolves before they reset their heat cap.

ranks.name: Seismic Deluge
ranks.description: 1/round, when you successfully attack with a Launcher and consume Lock On, you may also knock your target Prone.

synergies.detail: 1/round, when you successfully attack with a Launcher and consume Lock On, you may also knock your target Prone.

ranks.name: Stormbending
ranks.description:
You have customized your mech with auxiliary concussive missile systems. 1/round, when you hit a character or object with a Launcher, you can choose one of the following effects:
  • Lightning: You fire a concentrated blast of missiles at that character. They must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked away from you by 3 spaces; the force of firing then knocks you back by 3 spaces, away from the direction of fire.
  • Thunder: You fire a spray of missiles at a Burst 2 area around that target. Characters in the area must succeed on an Agility save or be knocked back by 1 space, away from the target. The primary target is unaffected.

synergies.detail:
1/round, when you hit a character or object with a Launcher, you can choose one of the following effects:
  • Lightning: You fire a concentrated blast of missiles at that character. They must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked away from you by 3 spaces; the force of firing then knocks you back by 3 spaces, away from the direction of fire.
  • Thunder: You fire a spray of missiles at a Burst 2 area around that target. Characters in the area must succeed on an Agility save or be knocked back by 1 space, away from the target. The primary target is unaffected.

ranks.name: TORRENT
ranks.description: Your mech is granted a micro-missile support system. Whenever you hit a character with a Launcher, roll 1d6. On a 5+, or on a 4+ if the triggering attack critically hits, a micro-missile fires at a character within the triggering weapon's Range (ignoring line of sight), dealing AP Kinetic equal to the weapon’s size (Auxiliary: 1, Main: 2, Heavy or larger: 3).

On a 5+, or on a 4+ if the triggering attack critically hits, a micro-missile fires at a character within the triggering weapon's Range (ignoring line of sight), dealing AP Kinetic equal to the weapon’s size (Auxiliary: 1, Main: 2, Heavy or larger: 3).
